      • getInstance

        public static VerID getInstance(int id)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Get an instance of Ver-ID by its instance ID.

        The instance is created by Ver-ID factory.

        Parameters:
        id - ID of the instance to get
        Returns:
        Instance of VerID
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an instance with the given ID does not exists
        Since:
        1.0.0
